jyVis.data
Class CSVFileUtils

java.lang.Object
  jyVis.data.CSVFileUtils

public class CSVFileUtils
extends java.lang.Object

A utility class for reading and writing CVS (Comma Separated Value) data table files.

Author:
Curran Kelleher

readFile

public static DataTable readFile(java.io.File inputFile)
Reads the specified CSV file into a DataTable object.

Parameters:
inputFile - the CSV file to read
Returns:
a DataTable object which has the contents of the file in it, or null if there was an error.

readFile

public static DataTable readFile(java.lang.String filePath)
Reads the specified CSV file into a DataTable object.

Parameters:
filePath - the path of the CSV file to read
Returns:
a DataTable object which has the contents of the file in it, or null if there was an error.

writeFile

public static void writeFile(java.io.File outputFile,
                             java.util.List<DataRecord> records,
                             java.util.List<DataDimensionMetadata> dimensionNames)
Writes a csv file containing the specified records.

Parameters:
outputFile - the file to write to
records - the records to include in the file
dimensionNames - the list from which dimension names are extracted
